title: Talent.com Jobs Scraper
description: Scrapes job listings from Talent.com using search queries and location.

startUrl.title: Start URL
startUrl.description: Start scraping from a specific Talent.com search URL. If provided, this will be used instead of Keyword/Location.

location.title: Location
location.description: Optional location to filter jobs by.

maxItems.title: Maximum number of jobs
maxItems.description: The maximum number of jobs to collect. Leave empty to collect all available jobs.

cookies.title: Custom cookies (raw header)
cookies.description: Optional raw 'Cookie' header string. Can help bypass consent banners.

cookiesJson.title: Custom cookies (JSON)
cookiesJson.description: Optional JSON-formatted cookies. Accepts an array (e.g., [{"name":"a","value":"1"}]) or an object map (e.g., {"a":"1"}).
